code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import NoteList from'./components/NoteList';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[notes,setNotes]=useState([]);const[newNote,setNewNote]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{fetchNotes();},[]);const fetchNotes=async()=>{const response=await axios.get('/api/notes');setNotes(response.data);};const handleInputChange=event=>{setNewNote(event.target.value);};const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();await axios.post('/api/notes',{content:newNote});setNewNote('');fetchNotes();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Sync Scribe"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Enter a new note",value:newNote,onChange:handleInputChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Note"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NoteList,{notes:notes})]});};export default App;
